column2: SELECT id, fname, lname FROM studenter ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT id, name, YHP, beskrivning FROM kurser ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM studenter WHERE username='{0}' AND password='{1}'
SELECT * FROM lärare WHERE username='{0}' AND password='{1}'
SELECT k.id, k.name, k.YHP, k.beskrivning FROM studenter s INNER JOIN student_courses n ON n.student_id=s.id INNER JOIN kurser k ON k.id = n.kurser_id WHERE s.id='{0}'
SELECT k.id, k.name, k.YHP, k.beskrivning FROM lärare s INNER JOIN lärare_courses n ON n.lärare_id=s.id INNER JOIN kurser k ON k.id = n.kurser_id WHERE s.id='{0}'
SELECT k.id, k.name, k.YHP, k.beskrivning FROM lärare s INNER JOIN lärare_courses n ON n.lärare_id=s.id INNER JOIN kurser k ON k.id = n.kurser_id WHERE s.id='{0}' AND s.privilageType='admin'

column1: JOIN student_courses sc ON c.id = sc.kurser_id
JOIN studenter s ON sc.student_id = s.id
JOIN lärare_courses tc ON c.id = tc.kurser_id
JOIN lärare t ON tc.lärare_id = t.id
